Sentencas: Ultra-fast microwave sintering in a multi-mode domestic microwave oven with selective susceptor and spacer has been proved to be an effective and facile method in the manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Two anode support SOFCs were fabricated by using ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering techniques, separately.
Titulo: Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The performances of the two cells were measured and compared in a temperature range of 700-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The microstructures of the two cells after the measurements were compared qualitatively based on SEM images.
Titulo: Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: FIB-SEM technique was used to reconstruct the 3-D microstructure of both anode and cathode.
Titulo: Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The quantitative comparison of 3-D reconstructions shows the application potential and the advantages of microwave technique in SOFCs manufacturing.
Titulo: Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell
Comparison of ultra-fast microwave sintering and conventional thermal sintering in manufacturing of anode support solid oxide fuel cell
